channel.title: Some serious help on server
channel.description:
I am almost clue less on how to make a server i copied the server stormcutter had done and i got to port forwarding and to hard so i tried so mstuff and got it to work now i created a no-ip and everything just 2 questions
1. how do i make my server public it only runes on 0.0.0.0
2. can some 1 give me a good source (prfrabliy has skillcape emotes) and how to change it so it says my servers name and how to make me owner. (i wont leech just for at leat me and my friend to play on not steeling)

item.title: Some serious help on server
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

wise donkey like I said before. You need to get your default gateway. then type it in the adress box. When you get to your routers homepage you need to find firewall or something. When you find it look for something called “virtual servers”. if you don’t have that then look for it. You need to log in wih the default user. it should take you to a page with a bunch of boxes where you can find you ip address and stuff.

Read full topic
